items.title: Suspects sought after 9 killed in South Africa tavern mass shooting
items.description: A group of about a dozen assailants opened fire Sunday at a tavern in a South African township, police said.

items.title: WATCH:  Educator goes big with lessons involving a 43-foot whale
items.description: ABC News' Danny New explains why Jessica Woodend is travelling around her home state of Maine with a giant inflatable whale.
